oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Non-Archimedean Duality: Algebras, Groups, and Multipliers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kochubei, Anatoly N.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Rings and Algebras
Mathematics - Functional Analysis
Mathematics - Operator Algebras
Primary: 16T05, Secondary: 20G42, 43A40, 46H99, 46S10, 47L99
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We develop a duality theory for multiplier Banach-Hopf algebras over a non-Archimedean field K. As examples, we consider algebras corresponding to discrete groups and zero-dimensional locally compact groups with K-valued Haar measure, as well as algebras of operators generated by regular representations of discrete groups.
Comment: v2 - minor corrections. To appear in Algebras and Representation Theory
